typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		MeinDatum as string,
		MeineUhrzeit as string,
		MeinText as string,
		MeinZeitstempel as string,
		MeineFormel as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source1
source1 derive(MeinText = "ezuirzue") ~> DerivedColumn1
DerivedColumn1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	umask: 0022,
	preCommands: [],
	postCommands: [],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1
